text: Sale of liquor in Tasmac-run IMFL retail in Kanyakumari district touched an all-time high of Rs. 3.26 crore on the day of Pongal festival, sources in the department said here on Monday. A Tasmac official, on condition of anonymity, said sale through 144 outlets in the district on a normal day ranged between Rs. 2 crore to Rs. 2.25 crore. The sale on the day prior to Pongal festival (Bogi) was Rs. 2.31 crore and on the following day it rose to Rs. 3.26 crore.
title: Tasmac sales touches all-time high
